name: Aamu associates
membership: The Finnish Association of Communication Professionals – ProCom
goal:
A privately-owned communications agency, Aamu associates is focused in offering corporate communication and public affairs services in Brussels to help companies and organisations participate in the EU legislative process.

We companies and organisations find fresh opportunities and innovative ways to get business gains in the EU through communications, and build a better, more sustainable future.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Climate Action, Communication, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Circular economy (Plastics strategy, Single use plastics), climate and environment, forestry, transport and energy (Renewable energy directive II), industry and entrepreneurship, research and innovation, and EU finance (Sustainable finance).
